name: Opossum Run!
description:
Play here!!

Opossum Run! is a reskin of the 1978 popular game Rocket Patrol where players play as tiny trashy gremlin, Stinky, to try and secure a delish meal of fish without getting hit

Using starter code from Nathan Altice's Rocket Patrol repository, students were encouraged to make as many modifications to the original game as they wanted or to reskin it entirely.
